0.text: Basic Attack: Kalista hurls a spear at her target, dealing 90% AD physical damage and applying  on-hit and on-attack effects. Basic attacks can  critically strike to deal (157.5% +  23.625%) AD physical damage.
0.html: Basic Attack: Kalista hurls a spear at her target, dealing 90% AD physical damage and applying on-hit and on-attack effects. Basic attacks can critically strike to deal (157.5% +  23.625%) AD physical damage.
markedPassages: on-hit
critically strike
(157.5% +  23.625%) AD
23.625%

1.text: Kalista's basic attack windup is  uncancellable except by casting  Rend, although she can input a new attack command to change her target during the windup. Her basic attacks have no effect if she loses  sight of the target at any point before it hits.
1.html: Kalista's basic attack windup is uncancellable except by casting Rend, although she can input a new attack command to change her target during the windup. Her basic attacks have no effect if she loses sight of the target at any point before it hits.
markedPassages: uncancellable
Rend
sight

2.text: Additionally, Kalista's attack windup is only reduced by 0.75% per  1% bonus attack speed.
2.html: Additionally, Kalista's attack windup is only reduced by 0.75% per  1% bonus attack speed.
markedPassages: 1% bonus attack speed

1.text: SPEED: 1025 / 1100 / 1160 (BASED ON BOOTS TIER)

0.text: Innate: Whenever Kalista inputs a movement command during her  basic attack windup or the cast time of  Pierce, she will  dash in the target direction.Kalista's dash from Martial Poise will be  knocked down by any  immobilizing or  polymorphing crowd control, excluding  sleep(bug).
0.html:
Innate: Whenever Kalista inputs a movement command during her basic attack windup or the cast time of Pierce, she will dash in the target direction.

Kalista's dash from Martial Poise will be knocked down by any immobilizing or polymorphing crowd control, excluding sleep(bug).

dash

possibleConcerningAbilities: Kalista's dash from Martial Poise will be  knocked down by any  immobilizing or  polymorphing crowd control, excluding  sleep(bug).

1.text: The range and speed of Martial Poise are modified by the tier of Kalista's Boots. The base range when dashing from a basic attack is 250 / 265 / 280 (based on Boots Tier) units. This base distance is reduced when dashing toward the direction of her attack, to a minimum of 150 / 165 / 180 (based on Boots Tier) units.
1.html: The range and speed of Martial Poise are modified by the tier of Kalista's Boots. The base range when dashing from a basic attack is 250 / 265 / 280 (based on Boots Tier) units. This base distance is reduced when dashing toward the direction of her attack, to a minimum of 150 / 165 / 180 (based on Boots Tier) units.

1.text: 150 / 165 / 180 (based on Boots Tier)

2.text: The base range when dashing from  Pierce's cast is increased「 by 50 units. 」「 to 300 / 315 / 330 (based on Boots Tier) units. 」If dashing away from the point of cast, the dash range is reduced, to a minimum of 165 / 180 / 195 (based on Boots Tier) units.
2.html: The base range when dashing from Pierce's cast is increased「 by 50 units. 」「 to 300 / 315 / 330 (based on Boots Tier) units. 」If dashing away from the point of cast, the dash range is reduced, to a minimum of 165 / 180 / 195 (based on Boots Tier) units.

1.text: 165 / 180 / 195 (based on Boots Tier)

「 to 300 / 315 / 330 (based on Boots Tier) units. 」

3.text: Innate - Oathsworn Bond: Kalista begins the game with an exclusive  Black Spear.
3.html: Innate - Oathsworn Bond: Kalista begins the game with an exclusive Black Spear.
markedPassages: Black Spear

1.text: COOLDOWN: 8

0.text: Active: Kalista launches a spear in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit.
0.html: Active: Kalista launches a spear in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit.

1.text: If Pierce kills the target, the spear continues onward to transfer all of the target's  Rend stacks to the next enemy it hits. This can repeat indefinitely until the spear reaches its maximum range.
1.html: If Pierce kills the target, the spear continues onward to transfer all of the target's Rend stacks to the next enemy it hits. This can repeat indefinitely until the spear reaches its maximum range.
markedPassages: Rend

1.text: CAST TIME: 0.5

0.text: Passive - Soul-Marked: While Kalista and her  Oathsworn are  tethered, their basic attacks and  Pierce apply a Soul-Mark to their targets.
0.html: Passive - Soul-Marked: While Kalista and her Oathsworn are tethered, their basic attacks and Pierce apply a Soul-Mark to their targets.
markedPassages: Oathsworn
tethered
Pierce

1.text: If both Soul-Marks are applied to the same target within 4 seconds, they take bonus magic damage, capped against non-champions, and cannot be Soul-Marked again for a few seconds. Soul-Mark deals a minimum of 75 damage to  minions, executes them if they're below  125 health, and is capped against non-champions. Kalista applies the damage on-attack while the Oathsworn does so  on-hit.
1.html: If both Soul-Marks are applied to the same target within 4 seconds, they take bonus magic damage, capped against non-champions, and cannot be Soul-Marked again for a few seconds. Soul-Mark deals a minimum of 75 damage to minions, executes them if they're below  125 health, and is capped against non-champions. Kalista applies the damage on-attack while the Oathsworn does so on-hit.
markedPassages: minions
125 health
125 health
on-hit

2.text: Active: Kalista summons a Sentinel that patrols back and forth on a path along the target location, granting  sight of its surroundings as it travels.
2.html: Active: Kalista summons a Sentinel that patrols back and forth on a path along the target location, granting sight of its surroundings as it travels.
markedPassages: sight

3.text: Kalista periodically stocks a Sentinel charge, up to a maximum of 2.
3.html: Kalista periodically stocks a Sentinel charge, up to a maximum of 2.

4.text: See Pets for more details about Sentinels.
4.html: See Pets for more details about Sentinels.
possibleConcerningAbilities: See Pets for more details about Sentinels.

0.text: Passive: Kalista's basic attacks  on-hit and  Pierce apply a stack of Rend to enemies for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits and stacking up to 254 times.
0.html: Passive: Kalista's basic attacks on-hit and Pierce apply a stack of Rend to enemies for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits and stacking up to 254 times.
markedPassages: on-hit
Pierce

1.text: Active: Kalista rips all lodged spears from nearby enemies, consuming all of their stacks to deal them physical damage and  slow them for 2 seconds. Each additional spear on the target deals reduced damage. Rend deals 50% reduced damage against epic  monsters.
1.html: Active: Kalista rips all lodged spears from nearby enemies, consuming all of their stacks to deal them physical damage and slow them for 2 seconds. Each additional spear on the target deals reduced damage. Rend deals 50% reduced damage against epic monsters.
markedPassages: slow
monsters

2.text: If Rend kills at least one target, the  cooldown is reset and Kalista restores  mana.
2.html: If Rend kills at least one target, the  cooldown is reset and Kalista restores  mana.
markedPassages: cooldown
mana

3.text: A nearby enemy with a Rend stack is required to cast this ability. Rend can be used during the dash of  Martial Poise and the cast time of  Pierce. In-flight spears and  Pierce if in cast will be empowered to apply Rend's effects to their targets. These empowered spears can also trigger Rend's refund.
3.html: A nearby enemy with a Rend stack is required to cast this ability. Rend can be used during the dash of Martial Poise and the cast time of Pierce. In-flight spears and Pierce if in cast will be empowered to apply Rend's effects to their targets. These empowered spears can also trigger Rend's refund.
markedPassages: Martial Poise
Pierce
Pierce
possibleConcerningAbilities: A nearby enemy with a Rend stack is required to cast this ability. Rend can be used during the dash of  Martial Poise and the cast time of  Pierce. In-flight spears and  Pierce if in cast will be empowered to apply Rend's effects to their targets. These empowered spears can also trigger Rend's refund.

1.text: COOLDOWN: 150 / 120 / 90

0.text: Active: Kalista invokes her  tether to retrieve her Oathsworn and hold them for 4 seconds,  pulling them to her over 1 second and  cleansing them from all  crowd control, as well as rendering them  invulnerable and  untargetable for the duration.
0.html: Active: Kalista invokes her tether to retrieve her Oathsworn and hold them for 4 seconds, pulling them to her over 1 second and cleansing them from all crowd control, as well as rendering them invulnerable and untargetable for the duration.
markedPassages: tether
pulling
cleansing
crowd control
invulnerable
untargetable

1.text: While held, the Oathsworn is  vanished and may  dash with  displacement immunity to end Fate's Call's effects and reappear at the target location; after the duration, they will automatically do so at maximum range from Kalista's facing direction. The Oathsworn stops upon colliding with an enemy  champion,  knocking up all nearby enemies for a duration and landing to their  basic attack range from the target collided with.
1.html:
While held, the Oathsworn is vanished and may dash with displacement immunity to end Fate's Call's effects and reappear at the target location; after the duration, they will automatically do so at maximum range from Kalista's facing direction.
The Oathsworn stops upon colliding with an enemy champion, knocking up all nearby enemies for a duration and landing to their  basic attack range from the target collided with.
markedPassages: vanished
dash
displacement immunity
champion
knocking
basic attack range

2.text: The Oathsworn must be nearby to cast this ability, and is also  silenced and unable to perform movement or attack commands while Fate's Call is in effect.
2.html: The Oathsworn must be nearby to cast this ability, and is also silenced and unable to perform movement or attack commands while Fate's Call is in effect.
markedPassages: silenced
